polygon.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;

path.style: fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #231f20; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
fill: none; stroke: #3f61ad; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 4px;
